name: Whirling Death
desc: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.

name: Sand Storm
desc: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.

name: Cursed Crown
desc: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.

name: Static Field
desc: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.

name: Epicenter
desc: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

name: Ancient Seal
desc: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

name: Terrorize
desc: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.

name: Healing Ward
desc: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 420 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.

name: Dragon Blood
desc: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

name: Overgrowth
desc: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
